alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Hampshire; Jefferson; Morgan (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 7:16AM EST until February 25 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...One last batch of precipitation is moving through this morning, which will fall as freezing rain in the advisory area. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central and northern Maryland, northern and northwest Virginia and eastern and panhandle West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
